item.title: Palawan Tribe
item.description:
üß≠ Description

Official website of Palawan Tribe Dolce Amore, a non-profit association supporting indigenous communities in Palawan, Philippines.

Built with ‚ù§Ô∏è by Manuel ‚Äì Assembler Computer, the site is multilingual (Italian & English), fast, sustainable, and designed to reflect the warmth and harmony of tribal life.

Includes sections on history, vision, photo gallery, and contact ‚Äì all optimized for mobile and slow connections, with ethical SEO and zero tracking.
